attributes.action: Harshen the prison sentences and convictions concerning the prisons themselves, life sentences, child criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1- Prisons are far too comfortable, these people commited crimes comforable prisons isn't helping and in fact makes serving time seem almost appealing.

2- When a life sentence is delivered there is no chance of parole or of the criminal being released until they are dead.


3- Child criminals should be named and shamed if they commit a crime then the public have a right to know who they are.  Essentially ridding "We can not disclose the child's identity."


4- Public humiliation punishments such as the stocks should be bought back for minor crimes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
